name: brave-bird
effect: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
short_effect: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user tucks in its wings and charges from a low altitude. The user also takes serious damage.
flavor_text.platinum: The user tucks in its wings and charges from a low altitude. The user also takes serious damage.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user tucks in its wings and charges from a low altitude. The user also takes serious damage.
